mapper.insert: insert into xyfw_work (work_id,user_id, work_name, work_number, work_money, work_unit,work_start_time,work_end_time,work_content,work_type,work_user,work_phone,work_pic) values (#{work_id},#{user_id}, #{work_name}, #{work_number}, #{work_money}, #{work_unit},#{work_start_time},#{work_end_time},#{work_content},#{work_type},#{work_user},#{work_phone},#{work_pic})
